biotools.summary: DNAscent is a software for detecting contiguous regions of base analogues incorporated in Oxford Nanopore reads. It is able to detect replication forks in Nanopore sequencing data with deep learning.

bioschemas.name: DNAscent
bioschemas.summary: DNAscent is a software for detecting contiguous regions of base analogues incorporated in Oxford Nanopore reads. It is able to detect replication forks in Nanopore sequencing data with deep learning.
